original: @96a // lha mo ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽sgrol ma khro mo'i ba lim gi gtor ma la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam //
analyzed: @96a // lha mo ral gcig ma la phyag 'tshal lo // sgrol ma khro mo'i ba lim gi gtor ma la sngags 'dis lan gsum mam //

translated: One should offer the bali torma of wrathful Tārā with this mantra three or seven times.

original: aom hr'im: ae ka dz'a ti sa ma ya /
analyzed: aom hr'im: ae ka dz'a ti sa ma ya /
translated: oṃ hriṃ ekajaṭī samaya🔽māraya sahanātha svāhā

original: ma b'a na sa ha na sv'a gri ku ru pushtim ku ru ma he taksha ka n'a g'a r'a pa ta ya /
analyzed: ma b'a na sa ha na sv'a gri ku ru pushtim ku ru ma he taksha ka n'a g'a r'a pa ta ya /

original: ai mam ba l'im grihna grihna /
analyzed: ai mam ba l'im grihna grihna /

original: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya ;
analyzed: grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya ;

original: bar mi r+ya kro sa bru ta bru ta /
analyzed: bar mi r+ya kro sa bru ta bru ta /

original: de nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma la bdag gi don la gsol ba gdab /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma la bdag gi don la gsol ba gdab /
translated: then supplicate Vajra Sarasvatī for one's own purpose.

original: rjes mi dmigs pa'i rgyas gdab /
analyzed: rjes mi dmigs pa'i rgyas gdab /
translated: Seal with the non-apprehension of the subsequent.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad kyi @96b don du bsngo //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad kyi @96b don du bsngo //
translated: Dedicate the root of merit for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: sgrol ma khros pa'i ba lim gi gtor ma rdzogs so /
analyzed: sgrol ma khros pa'i ba lim gi gtor ma rdzogs so /
translated: The bali offering of Wrathful Tārā is complete.

original: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta d'a na sh'i las /
analyzed: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta d'a na sh'i las /
translated: By the paṇḍita Dānaśīla from eastern India.

original: 'gren gyi 'phyang sar du rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: 'gren gyi 'phyang sar du rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//
translated: The translation of the commentary was done at the edge of the Dren plain.
